extension_desc.message: Allows you to navigate back by just hitting the mouse on the left side of your screen.

settings_px_tolerance_desc.message: Amount of pixels from the left side of every page, in which a mouse click will cause the browser to navigate back. You can choose different values for maximized and windowed browser frame.

settings_open_action_desc.message: Navigate back by left or right click.

settings_show_indicator_desc.message: Show an arrow on the left side of the page whenever a mouse click would cause the browser to navigate back.

settings_close_tab_desc.message: Close the current tab if you can not navigate back any further.
